txt.en: Enter the ruined interior of Tuntham
The ruins of Tuntham can be found north-east of Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should defeat the Orkish planning committee you found within one of the buildings in Tuntham.
The ruins of Tuntham can be found north-east of Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should enter the suspicious building at Tuntham.
Break up the Orkish planning committee ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The ruins of Tuntham can be found north-east of Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should destroy the Orkish plans you found within one of the buildings in Tuntham.
The Morgul Orcs look at you with glaring eyes as they discuss plans for an invasion
You have successfully disbanded the the Orkish raiding party before they could plan their strike upon Bâr Húrin. Hopefully no other Orc knew of these plans.
Something unsettles you about these ruins. One of the buildings seems to have been recently occupied. The Rangers are skilled at leaving no trace behind. Perhaps further investigation is needed.
You decide to investigate one of the buildings in Tuntham that seems to have been recently occupied.
The ruins of Tuntham can be found north-east of Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should enter the suspicious building at Tuntham.
